title: Mafioso

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Foretell someone each night. At the end of the next night, you will perform an Investigator check (35) on them. At the end of the night after the night after the night after that, you will learn their role exactly.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not vote on odd-numbered days.
- You have a layer of Powerful defense that can block one attack.
